## getNumberFormatMultiplier() function

Determine a multiplier for the input value to account for any `scale` and `percent` tokens in the skeleton.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getNumberFormatMultiplier({ scale, unit }: Skeleton): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { scale, unit } | <code>Skeleton</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

## Remarks

With ICU NumberFormatter, the `percent` skeleton would style `25` as "25%". To achieve the same with `Intl.NumberFormat`<!-- -->, the input value must be `0.25`<!-- -->.
